scene_target: Establish Kaelen's isolation and the imminent failure of the High Spire's wards.
goal: Inspect the physical and magical integrity of the High Spire's defenses.
conflict: Kaelen's dwindling magical reserves versus the accelerating decay of the ancient wards.
end_condition: Kaelen realizes the wards cannot hold another night and the isolation of his post becomes a liability.

world_updates.location: High Spire battlements and West Gate
recent_facts: Kaelen is experiencing significant physical and magical strain from the failing wards.
The High Spire's wards are sloughing off as crystalline dust and emitting violet sparks.
The Starwrought Oath in Kaelen's marrow is thinning and turning the color of tarnished pewter.
A resonance-tuning fork charred and shrieked when tested against the Spire's stone, indicating the wards are being consumed by an external force.
Commander Varkas has been missing in the lower archives for three days.

last_scene: Kaelen performed a desperate inspection of the High Spire's crumbling defenses as the sun set.
He discovered that the wards are not merely decaying but are being actively consumed by an external celestial pressure.
The scene ended with a catastrophic groan from the Great Seal and Kaelen fleeing toward the archives to find Commander Varkas.
key_events: Kaelen attempted to reinforce a failing iron ward-ring, resulting in a painful magical backlash.
The Star-glass of the West Gate was found to be 'feverish' and heavily fractured.
Kaelen's tuning fork was destroyed by the intense discordant energy of the Spire.
Kaelen realized the isolation of his post has become a deadly liability as the wards began to catastrophically fail.
must_stay_true: Kaelen's magic is tied to a physical 'Starwrought Oath' that manifests as a thread in his wrist.
Magic use has a clear physical cost, including coldness, scorched lungs, and metallic scents.
The High Spire is isolated and the wards are failing at an accelerated, unnatural rate.
The stars are appearing 'heavy' and unstable in the sky.
chapter_so_far_add: Kaelen discovers the High Spire's wards are failing beyond repair and suspects an external celestial threat.
